summary: Defines a scenario class that configures a series of simulation runs to compare baseline health system performance with scaled‑up disease‑specific programmes (HIV, TB, malaria and a combined package). It sets a common scale‑up start date, retains default health‑system settings, and supplies utilities for generating parameter sets, logging configuration details and accessing related model modules.
business_intent: To assess the health impact and resource implications of expanding individual or combined disease control programmes, enabling policymakers and analysts to evaluate horizontal versus vertical program strategies.
